title: Anybody need a quarterback?
author: VD
content_html: I don’t know if Kurt Warner can still play. But if I didn’t have a marque quarterback, I’d sure sign him and find out for myself. Even if he won’t ever regain the form that had TMQ writing about him being an alien entity, he’d make for a solid backup.
content_text:
I don’t know if Kurt Warner can still play.  But if I didn’t have a marque quarterback,
I’d sure sign him
and find out for myself.  Even if he won’t ever regain the form that had TMQ writing about him being an alien entity, he’d make for a solid backup.
